title: Panduan Interaktif FFmpeg Visual: Audio & Video

content.text: Selamat Datang! ğŸ‘‹ Panduan interaktif FFmpeg visual untuk audio & video. Pilih topik di menu sebelah kiri. Tiap blok menampilkan diagram visual proses dan tombol "Salin" untuk menyalin perintah. Jaga Data Pribadi Tetap Aman Facebook Twitter WhatsApp Ubah Format Audio MP3 â†’ OGG ğŸµinput.mp3 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp3 output.ogg â†’ ğŸ¶output.ogg Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp3 output.ogg Batch Convert Audio ğŸ“folder/*.mp3 â†’ for f in *.mp3; do ffmpeg -i "$f" "${f%.mp3}.ogg"; done â†’ ğŸ“folder/*.ogg Salin for f in *.mp3; do ffmpeg -i "$f" "${f%.mp3}.ogg"; done WAV â†’ MP3 ğŸµ input.wav â†’ ffmpeg -i input.wav -codec:a libmp3lame -qscale:a 2 output.mp3 â†’ ğŸ¶ output.mp3 Salin ffmpeg -i input.wav -codec:a libmp3lame -qscale:a 2 output.mp3 Normalize Audio ğŸµ input.mp3 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -af "loudnorm" output.mp3 â†’ ğŸ¶ output.mp3 (normalized) Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -af "loudnorm" output.mp3 Trim Video ğŸ¬ input.mp4 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -ss 00:00:10 -to 00:00:20 -c copy output.mp4 â†’ ğŸ¬ output.mp4 (trimmed) Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -ss 00:00:10 -to 00:00:20 -c copy output.mp4 Resize Video ğŸ¬ input.mp4 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf scale=1280:720 output.mp4 â†’ ğŸ¬ output.mp4 (resized) Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf scale=1280:720 output.mp4 Extract Audio ğŸ¬ input.mp4 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -q:a 0 -map a output.mp3 â†’ ğŸµ output.mp3 Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -q:a 0 -map a output.mp3 Convert MP4 â†’ WebM ğŸ¬ input.mp4 â†’ ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libvpx -b:v 1M -c:a libvorbis output.webm â†’ ğŸ¬ output.webm Salin ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libvpx -b:v 1M -c:a libvorbis output.webm Batch Convert Video ğŸ“ folder/*.mov â†’ for f in *.mov; do ffmpeg -i "$f" -c:v libx264 -c:a aac "${f%.mov}.mp4"; done â†’ ğŸ“ folder/*.mp4 Salin for f in *.mov; do ffmpeg -i "$f" -c:v libx264 -c:a aac "${f%.mov}.mp4"; done ğŸ„¯ 2025 Command Line Guides | Konten Interaktif

meta.summary: Panduan FFmpeg visual interaktif: konversi, trim, batch convert, resize, extract audio, normalize menggunakan perintah command line yang mudah disalin.
